title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit in ND/HND Accounting From a recognized Institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Agricultural Technology, Animal Health & Production Technology, Agronomy & Soil Science, Agricultural Economics and Fisheries or Forestry. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Biology/Agriculture and any two (2) of Chemistry, Physics or Mathematics.

title: ANIMAL & ENVIRONMENTAL BIOLOGY
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Animal Health & Production Technology, Animal Science, Biology, Agricultural Science or Zoology. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and any one (1) of Agriculture, Physics or Geography.
subjects:
Biology/Agriculture and

Any two (2) of Chemistry, Physics or Geography

title: BIOTECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Science Lab Tech; Environmental Biology, Plant Science or Biology, and other relevant subjects Plus ‘‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics or Geography

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Business Administration plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any other two (2) social science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Chemistry.

Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics & Statistics and Physics, and other relevant fields from a recognized institution, Plus ‘O’ level requirements
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: CRIMINOLOGY & SECURITY STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Economics, Business Administration, Banking and Finance, Accounting, Marketing or Purchasing and Supply, from a recognized institution.

Plus ‘O’ level requirements.

.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: Minimum of Merit in NCE Biology and other relevant subjects (Biology as major). From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, and one (1) other science subject
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Minimum of Merit in NCE Chemistry and other relevant subjects (Chemistry as major) Plus ‘O’ level requirements, from a recognized institution.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: Minimum of Merit in NCE Computer Science, Mathematics or Physics, (Computer Science as major) Plus ‘O’ level requirements,  from a recognized institution
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes or its equivalents including Mathematics, English Language and three (3) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry and Geography.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
Minimum of Merit in NCE Economics, and any other relevant subjects (Economics as major) from a recognized institution.

Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) Social Science Subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any two (2) other subjects from Commerce, Geography, History, and Government

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Minimum of Merit in NCE English Language and other relevant subjects (English Language as major), From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects

title: EDUCATION & ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements:
Minimum of Merit in NCE Islamic Studies

And other relevant subject (Islamic Studies as major) From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and two (2) other relevant subjects
subjects: Islamic Studies/Arabic and two (2) other Social Science or Arts subjects  .

title: EDUCATION & MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Minimum of Merit in NCE Mathematics and other relevant subjects (mathematics as major), From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus three (3) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
Minimum of Merit in NCE

Physics and other relevant subjects (Physics as major), From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other science subject

title: EDUCATIONAL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
Minimum of Merit in NCE Education subjects From a recognized institution.

Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Minimum of 5 credits including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and at least two (2) credits in relevant teaching subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other Social Science/Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Geography and other relevant subjects From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, and any two (2) from Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Geography and two (2) other Arts or Social Science subjects

title: GUIDANCE & COUNSELLING
de_requirements: Minimum of Merit in NCE in Arts or social science subjects) From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND A’ Level passes in Islamic Studies and other relevant subjects From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Islamic Studies or Arabic and any two (2) relevant subjects.
subjects: Islamic Studies plus two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: LITERATURE IN ENGLISH
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND A’ Level passes in Literature in English and other relevant subjects From a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language, Mathematics and any two (2) from Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower/Merit Credit in ND/HND Mass communication and other relevant subjects From a recognized Institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower/Merit Credit in ND/HND Mathematics & Statistics or physics and other relevant subjects From a recognized Institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and any other three (3) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics or Geography.

title: PEACE STUDIES & CONFLICT  RESOLUTION
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Peace Studies And Conflict Resolution, Social Works, Sociology, Political science, Criminology, Strategic & Security Studies, and other relevant subjects from a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and any other two (2) from Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History, Economics and any other one (1) Social Science subject.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Physics, Mathematics and other relevant subjects from a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other one (1) Science subject
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: PLANT SCIENCE & BIOTECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Plant Science, Biotechnology, Science Lab Tech, and other relevant subjects from a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit ND/HND Political science and other relevant fields from a recognized institution.

Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government or History and any other two (2) from Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Public Administration and other relevant fields from a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and one (1) other relevant Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History,economics and any one other Social Science subject .

title: SOCIOLOGY
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Sociology and other relevant fields from a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government or History and any other two (2) from Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements: Minimum of Lower Credit/Merit in ND/HND Statistics and other relevant fields from a recognized institution. Plus ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) science subjects from Physics
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.
